about_the_game:
Galactic Veins – The Ultimate Survival Space Mining RPG

Lost in the Void, Fighting to Survive
After being pulled into a black hole, you awaken in a hostile, uncharted galaxy with no way home. Stranded and alone—save for your AI assistant—you must rely on limited knowledge, salvaged technologies, and your own ingenuity to survive. As you explore the galaxy, your AI companion will guide you with essential recipes, technologies, and tactical advice, helping you unravel the mysteries of this alien universe.

Command Massive Starships and Build Your Fleet
Take control of colossal spaceships and outfit them for any challenge the galaxy throws your way:

  • Customize mining vessels for efficient resource gathering.

  • Design combat-ready warships to defend against threats.

  • Salvage advanced components and research powerful upgrades.
    Build a fully customizable fleet that’s ready to explore, defend, or dominate.

Claim and Expand Your Space Station
Your journey begins with the discovery of a derelict space station. Reclaim it as your base of operations, then:

  • Rebuild and expand it to support your growing ambitions.

  • Add new modules for crafting, research, and production.

  • Construct a shipyard to design and produce your fleet.
    Turn your station into a thriving hub of activity and a launchpad for your cosmic adventures.

Uncover Secrets and Salvage the Unknown
The galaxy is littered with derelict ships—remnants of a lost civilization—that are still operational and fiercely hostile. Salvage these dangerous relics to:

  • Uncover lost technologies.

  • Unlock new AI assistants to join your crew.

  • Piece together the story of this enigmatic galaxy.
    But be prepared—these ancient machines will defend their secrets at all costs.

Research, Build, and Survive
Gather resources, research groundbreaking technologies, and unlock the potential of this new world:

  • Develop advanced tools, weapons, and ship modules.

  • Gain an edge in mining, combat, and exploration.

  • Master RTS-inspired production systems to optimize your operations.
    Every decision shapes your journey and determines your survival.

The Universe is Yours to Shape
In Galactic Veins, your path is your own. Will you become:

  • A mining tycoon, dominating the trade?

  • A fearless explorer, uncovering the galaxy’s secrets?

  • A tactical genius, commanding an unstoppable fleet?
    With endless opportunities for action, strategy, and discovery, the galaxy is yours to conquer.

Wishlist now and prepare to chart your course through the stars!

name: Galactic Veins

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-3570K or AMD FX-8310
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 1060 4GB or Radeon RX 590
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 30 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 11 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-4790 or AMD Ryzen 3 3200G
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: RTX 2060 6GB or Radeon RX 5700
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 30 GB available space

short_description: Galactic Veins is a groundbreaking survival RPG that seamlessly blends action and RTS. Lost in an uncharted galaxy, you'll explore hostile regions filled with danger and mystery. Harvest resources, salvage technologies, and uncover the secrets of the universe as you fight to find your way back home.
